response.original_title: Blue's Clues & You!: Blue's Big Baking Show
response.overview: It’s a sweet and delicious day at Blue’s Bakery as Josh and Blue are baking bibingka — a cake from the Philippines! Next up is a trip to Blue’s Bistro, a very fancy restaurant. Then, celebrate your birthday with an incredibly special birthday cake made by Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper. And finally, play detective and try to find Mr. Salt’s missing pies, dun dun dun!
response.title: Blue's Clues & You!: Blue's Big Baking Show
